overview: Joe Armstrong, an orphaned drifter with little respect for much other than martial arts, finds himself on an American Army base in The Philippines after a judge gives him a choice of enlistment or prison. On one of his first missions driving a convoy, his platoon is attacked by a group of rebels who try to steal the weapons the platoon is transporting and kidnap the base colonel's daughter.
tagline: The deadliest art of the Orient is now in the hands of an American.
cast: Michael Dudikoff|Steve James|Judie Aronson|Guich Koock|John Fujioka
